## DatabaseConnection.disconnect() method

Disconnects from the database.

**Signature:**

```typescript
disconnect(): Promise<boolean>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A promise that resolves to a boolean indicating the success of the disconnection.
